tags: maybee?? could just be regular sugar baby i guess
summary: I'm here for Peter just being so ridiculously spoiled. He just gets everything he wants the second he glances at it, regardless...
question: I'm here for Peter just being so ridiculously spoiled. He just gets everything he wants the second he glances at it, regardless of what it costs. Tony will make him breakfast in bed so he can stay cosy on chilly mornings. They get their starter, main course and desserts from different restaurants when Peter's feeling fussy about what he eats. He gets at least one treat every day for being so perfect, ranging from a new lipgloss to a vacation depending on reports from Happy about bratty moments.
answer:
YESSSSSS

Now I can’t stop thinking about Peter being a picky eater and Tony trying to make excuses for all the spoiling like when he suggests a third trip to Italy in 4 months and he’s like ”the sun will do some good for your vitamin D deficiency” (except that Peter doesn’t have a vitamin D deficiency)

body:
today in spanish class

we were talking about movies, specifically using The Avengers as an example.

This very annoying guy who sits by me yelled out “Tony Stark’s dead.” and my teacher snaps her head over to us, points her finger at him and goes, “No! ¡No quiero!”

summary: Cliché New York Love Story AU {Starker} PART 2
title: Cliché New York Love Story AU {Starker} PART 2
body:
AU by the amazing @reniisbooks uwu

Enjoy

—————————————-

The rest of the day was hell for Peter- like any other day for that matter. He got to college, almost fell asleep during a lecture and got slapped with maybe ten assignments due next month, then he tiredly took the subway to a small Cafe where he worked - to be able to pay rent and stuff, since he was on a scholarship- then finally, finally got home and collapsed on his couch. It was around 5:48 pm when Peter woke up from a much needed nap. He heard a knock on his apartment door and raised a brow. No one ever came over to visit him, he didn’t have any good friends to come over whenever they wanted and his Aunt was all the way in Europe for work-

Shit. The date. Tony. He totally forgot! Damn it Parker you don’t forget about your date with Tony fucking Stark! He immediately checked his phone. No messages, no calls–barely 5:50

… But the date was at eight…? He let out a breath of relief, it couldn’t be him. He lazily got out of bed and walked to the door confused as hell. The knocking had stopped a while ago but he still unlocked and opened the door to see absolutely no-one standing on the hallway. It was probably a prank, he guessed, before looking down to see a beautiful white box tied with a black, silk ribbon. On top of it, there was a red rose and a small envelop. Peter was hesitant, looking around for a bit to see if the address was mistaken and someone would come back for the package, but after a few minuets he picked it up, carefully, because god damn it looked so expensive. That box alone was probably worth more than his entire apartment. He took it inside and placed it on the small desk next to his couch, taking a look at the envelope at first. There was nothing written on it. He shrugged and opened it carefully, so in case it wasn’t actually for him he could seal it back. After opening it as slow as possible he pulled out a hand written note

“Hope it fits”

Peter raised a brow. This was so weird and confusing his head hurt. Maybe he was still asleep? He slid the note back inside the envelope and left it aside, on his desk, then took the rose and placed in a water vase.

He finally got to the box and pulled the ribbon, untying the pretty bow on top and opened it, scared and anxious. There could’ve been a bomb inside, just saying.

Instead, he saw fabric. Beautiful, dark blue fabric that smelled new and luxurious. He gently pulled it out and damn it- it was a three piece suit, in what seemed to be his size, next to delicately folded white button up. This was Tony’s doing. Clearly. He rolled his eyes but couldn’t help smiling and blushing. He didn’t expect this when Tony said ’I’ll handle the rest’ but he was happy he did. Of course, he felt so overwhelmed and a bit guilty for making the other spend money on him, but he was gonna pay him back. Eventually.

At around 6:32 Peter started getting ready. He took a hot shower, washed his hair with some strawberry scented shampoo (cuz it was on sale and he’s a broke college student), shaved and put on some perfume (The cheap kind cuz he can’t afford anything else. Tony’s gonna change that tho don’t worry)

He eventually put on the suit and it fit like a glove- Peter felt gorgeous. His confidence went through the roof for a moment before realizing the suit was probably more expansive than his entire existence. Cue panic attack.

Before he could worry too much though he heard another knock on the door and checked the time again - 7:58. Okay so maybe it was Tony this time. He rushed to the door and opened it eagerly with the brightest smile on his face.

“Hey kid” the man was standing there, in all his fancy glory, with a hand in his pocket and holding a bouquet of red roses with the other. He wore a suit similar to Peter’s, but in black, with a red tie and damn he looked hot.

“H-hey Mrs Stark! It’s nice to see you outside a subway for once…” he chuckled  “And thanks for the suit by the way”

“Hm…You look even prettier than i could ever imagine” Tony smirked pulling his hand out of his pocket, placing it on the boy’s waist and stepping closer to him.

“I give myself credit for making this investment”

“J-Jesus Tony!” The boy blushed darkly, covering his face

“What? Something wrong?” he teased, leaning in closer until they were pressed against each other like earlier that day, in the subway.

“You’re a precious little thing, you know? here… these are for you” he smiled sweetly, kissing his forehead and giving him the flowers

“Woah they’re…holy shit they’re so pretty …” the boy grabbed the bouquet and buried his nose in the petals, taking in the sweet, flowery scent.  “When I was little and lived with my aunt in the country side she had a gorgeous garden of roses … Whenever I see them I get nostalgic but God they’re so pretty ….” Peter whispered and looked up at his date “I’ll put them in some water and be right back, okay? You can come inside to wait if you want”

Tony nodded, following the boy in the small apartment and looking around for a moment. There was a small, open kitchen connected to a tiny living room. There was a couch covered in blankets and an old TV that probably didn’t even work. There was a closet on the left side of the couch and a desk, with the opened white box , on the right side. The kitchen was also pretty empty but clean. Then there was a door, probably leading to the bathroom. As Peter filled a vase with water Tony couldn’t help but ask

“Hey kid? Where’s your bedroom?”

“Hm? Oh, I don’t have one. I sleep on the couch. I can’t afford an apartment with a bedroom.”

Tony’s heart shattered. He had to convince the boy to become his sugar baby so he could get him a better place than this-

“Alright ! All done. Shall we?” peter smiled setting the vase on his desk, next to the other rose

“Yeah, don’t wanna be late for our reservation”

“FoR oUr WhAt?!”

As it turned out to be, Tony took Peter to one of the most expensive restaurants in the world. They were led by a really sweet waitress to a table on a huge balcony, where no one else was seated, and served with the best champagne Peter had ever tasted. One small glance to his left and he could see the entire city from up there. Tony, on the other hand, only stared at the boy and laughed at his amazed gaze, his wide, honey brown eyes and parted, pink lips. He couldn’t possibly take his eyes off him.

“Tony- this is too much . I- I can’t thank you enough it’s just….”

“You don’t need to thank me”

“Come on now! This is- woah…I mean, do you do this with anyone cute you see on the subway? A-And what was a man like you doing on the subway it the first place!”

Tony chuckled “No, not everyone… Just you. And I was on the subway because I woke up in a bar and lost my phone. So i couldn’t call for a taxi. You think I’d figure something else out but i was hangover. That’s why I was so rude on the subway-“

“Alright, I can understand that, and if you didn’t realize it when I accepted to go out to you- I’ve forgiven you. But what about every other day?”

”Oh i just hoped to see you again. What can i say, you were very cute. Clumsy, but cute”

Peter’s eyes widened before he let out a chuckle, his cheeks were flushed and warm

“You did so much for me you dork- Oh god-“ He giggled, and Tony could only describe it as the most angelic sound he had ever heard.

About one hour later, after finishing their delicious 500 $ dinner, they couldn’t help but get lost in conversation and each other’s eyes. The moon was shining bright on the clear, night sky, the balcony was illuminated by fairy lights and candles, and there was soothing, mostly classical music playing from somewhere in the background. Everything was perfect, Tony wouldn’t have changed a thing.

At some point, the man stood up and held out his hand for Peter, who, with a raised brow and amused smile grabbed it and pulled himself out of the chair. Intertwining his fingers with the boy’s soft, delicate ones, Tony walked to the edge of the balcony, leaning his back against the glass railing with the boy pressed so close against his chest. All he had to say was “Come here… Let me hold you for a bit” and the boy was melting in his strong arms.  He held a hand on the boy’s waist, and ran the other through his soft, brown curls.  Peter blushed , leaning into the touch and shyly wrapping his arms around Tony’s neck, eventually resting his head on his shoulder.

“This is nice…” He whispered, turning his head to look up at the taller male, accidentally brushing his lips over his neck. He felt Tony tense for a mere moment, and a hand tightening around his waist. “Yeah…it is”

The boy pulled away, taking a step back and smiled up at the other. Tony looked down in admiration, like Peter was an angel sent from the heavens to sweeten the man’s bitter life.

“May I…?” He asked, tracing Peter’s bottom lip with his thumb and slowly leaning in

“Please…” the boy whispered, before closing his eyes and letting himself be pulled into a kiss. A soft, sweet kiss. A kiss that made butterflies appear in his belly. A kiss that filled his heart with pure joy. A kiss worth twenty years of waiting for.

Tony’s lips were fitting perfectly against Peter’s… They tasted like champagne and cigarettes… and Peter liked that. He liked that a lot. He wasn’t a fan of alcohol or smoking but he loved the taste- It was intoxicating and addicting.

Peter’s lips were so soft and he was so inexperienced, it made Tony want him even more. It was adorable, and precious.

A few moments later they pulled away, the need of air replacing their need of each other and the boy bit his lip, breathing heavily

“I …. never thought my …first kiss would turn out like this…” the boy chuckled and buried his head in the crock of Tony’s neck

“And what exactly do you mean by that sweetheart?” The man smirked, hugging him tightly

“I mean i never thought it would be this perfect Tony…You know, the man I’ve admired since I was a kid just kissed me… It doesn’t get much better than that”

“Good point” Tony smirked, sealing their lips together with another kiss.

—————————————–

@skyel0ve @harmonystarker @starkerthanreality @doctorpines @stereksoulmates @park-chimies-blog @peterparkersapunkassbitch @explicitstark

I hope that’s everyone who has commented on part one or rerblogged it! I hope you enjoyed this but I’m not sure if I should or shouldn’t start working on part three??? If this does well I will for sure though ! UwU

“Good point” Tony smirked, sealing their lips together with another kiss.

I hope that’s everyone who has commented on part one or rerblogged it! I hope you enjoyed this but I’m not sure if I should or shouldn’t start working on part three??? If this does well I will for sure though ! UwU

trail.content_raw:
AU by the amazing @reniisbooks uwu

Enjoy

—————————————-

The rest of the day was hell for Peter- like any other day for that matter. He got to college, almost fell asleep during a lecture and got slapped with maybe ten assignments due next month, then he tiredly took the subway to a small Cafe where he worked - to be able to pay rent and stuff, since he was on a scholarship- then finally, finally got home and collapsed on his couch. It was around 5:48 pm when Peter woke up from a much needed nap. He heard a knock on his apartment door and raised a brow. No one ever came over to visit him, he didn’t have any good friends to come over whenever they wanted and his Aunt was all the way in Europe for work-

Shit. The date. Tony. He totally forgot! Damn it Parker you don’t forget about your date with Tony fucking Stark! He immediately checked his phone. No messages, no calls–barely 5:50

… But the date was at eight…? He let out a breath of relief, it couldn’t be him. He lazily got out of bed and walked to the door confused as hell. The knocking had stopped a while ago but he still unlocked and opened the door to see absolutely no-one standing on the hallway. It was probably a prank, he guessed, before looking down to see a beautiful white box tied with a black, silk ribbon. On top of it, there was a red rose and a small envelop. Peter was hesitant, looking around for a bit to see if the address was mistaken and someone would come back for the package, but after a few minuets he picked it up, carefully, because god damn it looked so expensive. That box alone was probably worth more than his entire apartment. He took it inside and placed it on the small desk next to his couch, taking a look at the envelope at first. There was nothing written on it. He shrugged and opened it carefully, so in case it wasn’t actually for him he could seal it back. After opening it as slow as possible he pulled out a hand written note

“Hope it fits”

Peter raised a brow. This was so weird and confusing his head hurt. Maybe he was still asleep? He slid the note back inside the envelope and left it aside, on his desk, then took the rose and placed in a water vase.

He finally got to the box and pulled the ribbon, untying the pretty bow on top and opened it, scared and anxious. There could’ve been a bomb inside, just saying.

Instead, he saw fabric. Beautiful, dark blue fabric that smelled new and luxurious. He gently pulled it out and damn it- it was a three piece suit, in what seemed to be his size, next to delicately folded white button up. This was Tony’s doing. Clearly. He rolled his eyes but couldn’t help smiling and blushing. He didn’t expect this when Tony said ’I’ll handle the rest’ but he was happy he did. Of course, he felt so overwhelmed and a bit guilty for making the other spend money on him, but he was gonna pay him back. Eventually.

At around 6:32 Peter started getting ready. He took a hot shower, washed his hair with some strawberry scented shampoo (cuz it was on sale and he’s a broke college student), shaved and put on some perfume (The cheap kind cuz he can’t afford anything else. Tony’s gonna change that tho don’t worry)

He eventually put on the suit and it fit like a glove- Peter felt gorgeous. His confidence went through the roof for a moment before realizing the suit was probably more expansive than his entire existence. Cue panic attack.

Before he could worry too much though he heard another knock on the door and checked the time again - 7:58. Okay so maybe it was Tony this time. He rushed to the door and opened it eagerly with the brightest smile on his face.

“Hey kid” the man was standing there, in all his fancy glory, with a hand in his pocket and holding a bouquet of red roses with the other. He wore a suit similar to Peter’s, but in black, with a red tie and damn he looked hot.

“H-hey Mrs Stark! It’s nice to see you outside a subway for once…” he chuckled  “And thanks for the suit by the way”

“Hm…You look even prettier than i could ever imagine” Tony smirked pulling his hand out of his pocket, placing it on the boy’s waist and stepping closer to him.

“I give myself credit for making this investment”

“J-Jesus Tony!” The boy blushed darkly, covering his face

“What? Something wrong?” he teased, leaning in closer until they were pressed against each other like earlier that day, in the subway.

“You’re a precious little thing, you know? here… these are for you” he smiled sweetly, kissing his forehead and giving him the flowers

“Woah they’re…holy shit they’re so pretty …” the boy grabbed the bouquet and buried his nose in the petals, taking in the sweet, flowery scent.  “When I was little and lived with my aunt in the country side she had a gorgeous garden of roses … Whenever I see them I get nostalgic but God they’re so pretty ….” Peter whispered and looked up at his date “I’ll put them in some water and be right back, okay? You can come inside to wait if you want”

Tony nodded, following the boy in the small apartment and looking around for a moment. There was a small, open kitchen connected to a tiny living room. There was a couch covered in blankets and an old TV that probably didn’t even work. There was a closet on the left side of the couch and a desk, with the opened white box , on the right side. The kitchen was also pretty empty but clean. Then there was a door, probably leading to the bathroom. As Peter filled a vase with water Tony couldn’t help but ask

“Hey kid? Where’s your bedroom?”

“Hm? Oh, I don’t have one. I sleep on the couch. I can’t afford an apartment with a bedroom.”

Tony’s heart shattered. He had to convince the boy to become his sugar baby so he could get him a better place than this-

“Alright ! All done. Shall we?” peter smiled setting the vase on his desk, next to the other rose

“Yeah, don’t wanna be late for our reservation”

“FoR oUr WhAt?!”

As it turned out to be, Tony took Peter to one of the most expensive restaurants in the world. They were led by a really sweet waitress to a table on a huge balcony, where no one else was seated, and served with the best champagne Peter had ever tasted. One small glance to his left and he could see the entire city from up there. Tony, on the other hand, only stared at the boy and laughed at his amazed gaze, his wide, honey brown eyes and parted, pink lips. He couldn’t possibly take his eyes off him.

“Tony- this is too much . I- I can’t thank you enough it’s just….”

“You don’t need to thank me”

“Come on now! This is- woah…I mean, do you do this with anyone cute you see on the subway? A-And what was a man like you doing on the subway it the first place!”

Tony chuckled “No, not everyone… Just you. And I was on the subway because I woke up in a bar and lost my phone. So i couldn’t call for a taxi. You think I’d figure something else out but i was hangover. That’s why I was so rude on the subway-“

“Alright, I can understand that, and if you didn’t realize it when I accepted to go out to you- I’ve forgiven you. But what about every other day?”

”Oh i just hoped to see you again. What can i say, you were very cute. Clumsy, but cute”

Peter’s eyes widened before he let out a chuckle, his cheeks were flushed and warm

“You did so much for me you dork- Oh god-“ He giggled, and Tony could only describe it as the most angelic sound he had ever heard.

About one hour later, after finishing their delicious 500 $ dinner, they couldn’t help but get lost in conversation and each other’s eyes. The moon was shining bright on the clear, night sky, the balcony was illuminated by fairy lights and candles, and there was soothing, mostly classical music playing from somewhere in the background. Everything was perfect, Tony wouldn’t have changed a thing.

At some point, the man stood up and held out his hand for Peter, who, with a raised brow and amused smile grabbed it and pulled himself out of the chair. Intertwining his fingers with the boy’s soft, delicate ones, Tony walked to the edge of the balcony, leaning his back against the glass railing with the boy pressed so close against his chest. All he had to say was “Come here… Let me hold you for a bit” and the boy was melting in his strong arms.  He held a hand on the boy’s waist, and ran the other through his soft, brown curls.  Peter blushed , leaning into the touch and shyly wrapping his arms around Tony’s neck, eventually resting his head on his shoulder.

“This is nice…” He whispered, turning his head to look up at the taller male, accidentally brushing his lips over his neck. He felt Tony tense for a mere moment, and a hand tightening around his waist. “Yeah…it is”

The boy pulled away, taking a step back and smiled up at the other. Tony looked down in admiration, like Peter was an angel sent from the heavens to sweeten the man’s bitter life.

“May I…?” He asked, tracing Peter’s bottom lip with his thumb and slowly leaning in

“Please…” the boy whispered, before closing his eyes and letting himself be pulled into a kiss. A soft, sweet kiss. A kiss that made butterflies appear in his belly. A kiss that filled his heart with pure joy. A kiss worth twenty years of waiting for.

Tony’s lips were fitting perfectly against Peter’s… They tasted like champagne and cigarettes… and Peter liked that. He liked that a lot. He wasn’t a fan of alcohol or smoking but he loved the taste- It was intoxicating and addicting.

Peter’s lips were so soft and he was so inexperienced, it made Tony want him even more. It was adorable, and precious.

A few moments later they pulled away, the need of air replacing their need of each other and the boy bit his lip, breathing heavily

“I …. never thought my …first kiss would turn out like this…” the boy chuckled and buried his head in the crock of Tony’s neck

“And what exactly do you mean by that sweetheart?” The man smirked, hugging him tightly

“I mean i never thought it would be this perfect Tony…You know, the man I’ve admired since I was a kid just kissed me… It doesn’t get much better than that”

“Good point” Tony smirked, sealing their lips together with another kiss.

—————————————–

@skyel0ve @harmonystarker @starkerthanreality @doctorpines @stereksoulmates @park-chimies-blog @peterparkersapunkassbitch @explicitstark

I hope that’s everyone who has commented on part one or rerblogged it! I hope you enjoyed this but I’m not sure if I should or shouldn’t start working on part three??? If this does well I will for sure though ! UwU

blog.name: starker-obsession
blog.title: starker-obsession
blog.description: This is a side-blog which feeds my intense Starker obsession. Hannah/25/England/ my main is: asiriuscrushonmoony

title: Lost Moments (Starker)
body:
With Tony and Peter, it wasn’t meant to be.  They both knew that, and they’d known that a long time but they still couldn’t admit that to themselves or to each other.  It had been a long time coming - lingering touches, longing gazes, constant flirting that was so subtle but yet so not subtle at the same time.  They didn’t have to say the words to one another to know that somewhere along the line, they’d fallen madly and deeply in love.  But it wouldn’t work, and they knew that, so neither of them acted on their feelings.

They were in the middle of a mission.  Things were tense.  They’d been backed into a corner, stuck hiding between two large panels of metal.  There wasn’t a lot of room, and they found themselves pressed right up against each other.  To say there was a buzz of sexual energy flowing between them would be an understatement.  It was dark, but they could see each other perfectly.  Tony was staring down at Peter.  The look in his eyes could be interpreted as ‘I want you’, and Peter read it like Tony had said it aloud.  Peter stared right back, biting down softly on his lip and slowly releasing it, silently telling Tony ‘then have me’, and Tony understood.

Their lips were only inches apart.  All they had to do was close the gap.  Peter pressed himself closer to Tony, and Tony leaned his head down to capture the boy’s lips in a long-anticipated kiss.  This would be it, the moment they’d both been thinking about every second of every day…

A loud creak, and the door to the room they were hiding in was open.  Light streamed in and they became alert to their surroundings.  A voice echoed through the room.

“We’re done.  We can go back now,” came a familiar voice, belonging to Steve Rogers.  And that was it, their one chance missed.  Tony shuffled out from behind the metal panels, closely followed by Peter.  They didn’t utter a word to one another as they left the room and their lost moment behind, never to be spoken of again.

“We’re done.  We can go back now,” came a familiar voice, belonging to Steve Rogers.  And that was it, their one chance missed.  Tony shuffled out from behind the metal panels, closely followed by Peter.  They didn’t utter a word to one another as they left the room and their lost moment behind, never to be spoken of again.
trail.content:
With Tony and Peter, it wasn’t meant to be.  They both knew that, and they’d known that a long time but they still couldn’t admit that to themselves or to each other.  It had been a long time coming - lingering touches, longing gazes, constant flirting that was so subtle but yet so not subtle at the same time.  They didn’t have to say the words to one another to know that somewhere along the line, they’d fallen madly and deeply in love.  But it wouldn’t work, and they knew that, so neither of them acted on their feelings.

They were in the middle of a mission.  Things were tense.  They’d been backed into a corner, stuck hiding between two large panels of metal.  There wasn’t a lot of room, and they found themselves pressed right up against each other.  To say there was a buzz of sexual energy flowing between them would be an understatement.  It was dark, but they could see each other perfectly.  Tony was staring down at Peter.  The look in his eyes could be interpreted as ‘I want you’, and Peter read it like Tony had said it aloud.  Peter stared right back, biting down softly on his lip and slowly releasing it, silently telling Tony ‘then have me’, and Tony understood.

Their lips were only inches apart.  All they had to do was close the gap.  Peter pressed himself closer to Tony, and Tony leaned his head down to capture the boy’s lips in a long-anticipated kiss.  This would be it, the moment they’d both been thinking about every second of every day…

A loud creak, and the door to the room they were hiding in was open.  Light streamed in and they became alert to their surroundings.  A voice echoed through the room.

“We’re done.  We can go back now,” came a familiar voice, belonging to Steve Rogers.  And that was it, their one chance missed.  Tony shuffled out from behind the metal panels, closely followed by Peter.  They didn’t utter a word to one another as they left the room and their lost moment behind, never to be spoken of again.

title: Spared
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2DUL69p

by itstheallmother

Tony Stark was not supposed to be there.
But there he was.
And maybe Death was wrong about this, but something certainly felt right about letting her Anthony off the hook again, and again, and again.
